description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Balanced, Razor-Sharp, Tearing

Note: Weapon: Sword. Daemon WP 66 (Greater Slaaneshi Daemon), Bind Str 2 . Att. Bloodlust, Entrancing Aura, Clittering, Vicious. Unaligned or Slaanesh-Dedicated character encountering blade must make -60 Willpower Test to resist taking the weapon or to discard it. Gain +10 to test for each of the 6 Syllables of the Daemon's name the character knows (first is weapon's name). Must be Unaligned or Slaanesh Dedicated to use. When drawing weapon make +0 Willpower Test or enter Frenzy, can make -10 WP Test to sheath weapon. Can Feint as a Free Action once per turn, Dodging/Parrying weapon has -10.
